item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Tesla’s stock gets its lowest price target from a bull. It still implies 39% upside.
item.description: RBC Capital Markets cut Tesla’s expected price mark to $320 from $440 on lower projections for robotaxi and self-driving software.

item.title: Sarepta Therapeutics’ stock falls after patient dies of liver failure
item.description: The company said that more than 800 people have been treated with Elevidys, with only one experiencing liver failure.
